RuntimeErrorResolution.SampleLogOutput: Caused by: java.sql.SQLException: Table not found in statement [insert into User]
RuntimeErrorResolution.RegExpPattern: Caused by: java.sql.SQLException: Table not found in statement \[insert into (.*)\]
RuntimeErrorResolution.ProblemDetailHtml: You may be attempting to insert into a table that doesn't exist in the database.
RuntimeErrorResolution.SolutionDetailHtml: Check that the $1 table exists in your database schema
